channel.title: Posts on Zhan Shi
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zhan Shi

item.title: My Posts
item.description: Introduction Hello, my name is Zhan Shi, an incomming first year computer science Phd student at Rice University. I have recently graduated from University of Michigan, Computer Science & Enginnering with both my M.S. in Computer Science and B.S. double major in Computer Science and Mathematical Sciences (Algorithmic Methods Track). I will be following with professor Maryam Aliakbarpour in research of staistical machine learning, differential privacy and a lot of algorithms relating to big data.
